long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Stay Focused & Maximize Productivity with CodeGrow Ultra Focus Tool! 💻

Introducing CodeGrow Ultra Focus Tool, your go-to solution for blocking distracting websites and staying laser-focused on what matters. With just one click, eliminate distractions and take control of your work time! ⏳🔒

Core Features:

🚫 Block All Time-Wasting Websites effortlessly
🔗 Custom URL Blocking: Add your own list of distracting sites
⏱️ Instant Activation: Enable focus mode with a single click

Get back your productivity and focus on the task at hand without being tempted by social media, news sites, or other time sinks. Whether you're working on one project or juggling multiple, CodeGrow Ultra Focus Tool helps you stay on track!

Why Choose Us?

⚡ Easy to Use: Simple setup and activation for anyone
🔒 Complete Control: Customize your blocking list to match your needs
📈 Boost Productivity: Stay focused and hit your goals without interruptions

⚠️ Important Notice: This extension only blocks websites you choose and cannot block system applications or other non-browser distractions.

Disclaimer: This extension is independently developed and is not affiliated with any of the websites you block. All trademarks and copyrights belong to their respective owners.

Stay focused, stay productive, and make the most of your time with CodeGrow Ultra Focus Tool! 🎯
